remarks: Lemma for ~ alexsubALT .  If any cover taken from a subbase has a finite subcover, any cover taken from the corresponding base has a finite subcover.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Jan-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Dec-2013.)
statement:
alexsubALT.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
alexsubALTlem4 $p |- ( J = ( topGen ` ( fi ` x ) ) -> ( A. c e. ~P x ( X = U. c -> E. d e. ( ~P c i^i Fin ) X = U. d ) -> A. a e. ~P ( fi ` x ) ( X = U. a -> E. b e. ( ~P a i^i Fin ) X = U. b ) ) ) $.
$d J a b c d x $.
$d X a b c d x $.
